title: The Ultimate Fairy Tale- ‘Beauty & the Beast’ Inspired Wedding at Walt Disney World
text:
This week, we are celebrating a love story that is truly a tale as old as time. This Disney’s Fairy Tale Wedding couple chose an elegant, “ Beauty and the Beast ”-inspired event for their big day. 
Heather and Josh first met in college and instantly connected. There was something different this time, and they both knew it right away.
Heather is a huge Disney fan and has timeless memories from her vacations to the parks. From holidays to birthdays, Disney has always played a special role. When it came time to propose, Josh knew it had to be at Walt Disney World . He dropped to one knee at Picture Point, behind Disney’s Wedding Pavilion with Cinderella Castle in the distance, and of course, she said “Yes!”
The couple celebrated their modern day fairy tale with a lovely ceremony at Disney’s Wedding Pavilion and an extravagant, stunning reception at Disney’s Grand Floridian Resort Ballrooms. 

The day was filled with elements from “Beauty and the Beast” from Lumiere announcing the dinner service to a Beast inspired groom’s cake. Be our guest and check out all the details of their wonderful day.
